Wolf tank sight
My first custom sight
This took way too long, like I actually changed values to make this

Any issues, just comment below (cuz this is the first sight I've made)

I used the strv 103a in the creation process, and the screenshots

Reta : https://www.youtube.com/@retasnas
Original video : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XrEWhQBf_5w

RETA_Leo_1 : Open eye, Reticle sight
RETA_Leo_1_LS : Open eye, Leopard sight
RETA_Leo_1I : Close eye, Reticle sight
RETA_Leo_1I_LS : Close eye, Leopard sight

This is my second post. I also hope you enjoy it.

20 / 4 /2025 : Add and fix missing lines

#sight #mig21

YF-23 Sight for M46 Patton

Hi everybody, I just made a sight by myself. I used WTDraw to do it. The sight is a lil bit annoying, because the lines on the bottom of the sight are soo annoying during the battle, so I only recommend the download if you use the sight on your own risk!
By the way, this is my first ever sight, so please forgive me for everything!

Thanks for downloading,
ImGerey
